    def pytest_bdd_after_scenario(request, feature, scenario):

        if 'Delete_cleanUp' in tags:
            if context.ImmsID is not None:
                print(f"\n Delete Request is {context.url}/{context.ImmsID}")
                context.response = requests.delete(f"{context.url}/{context.ImmsID}", headers=context.headers)
                assert context.response.status_code == 204, f"Expected status code 204, but got {context.response.status_code}. Response: {context.response.json()}"
            else:
                print("Skipping delete: ImmsID is None")

attachments.name: Step Passed: batch file is created for below data as full dataset
Step Passed: batch file is uploaded in s3 bucket
Step Passed: file will be moved to destination bucket and inf ack file will be created
Step Passed: inf ack file has success status for processed batch file
Step Passed: bus ack file will be created
Step Passed: bus ack will not have any entry of successfully processed records
Step Passed: Audit table will have correct status, queue name and record count for the processed batch file
Step Passed: The imms event table will be populated with the correct data for 'created' event for records in batch file
Step Passed: The delta table will be populated with the correct data for all created records in batch file
